p: Virus was cultured in BHK-21 cells for three times. The supernatant were harvested three days after infection when CPE was evident. Cell debris was clarified by centrifugation, and virus was stored at − 80 °C in single-use aliquots. Virus stock titers were determined by standard plaque assay in Vero cells, and expressed as plaque-forming units (PFU/ml).
